output.pin_power: grep -A 18 'Power Distribution' *.out | tail -17 | sed 's/\*//g' | awk 'NF>0 {lines[++n]=$0} END {print "["; for(i=1;i<=n;i++) {printf "["; split(lines[i],a); for(j=1;j<=length(a);j++) printf "%s%s", a[j], (j<length(a)?",":""); printf "]%s\n", (i<n?",":"")} print "]"}'
output.pin_exposure: grep -A 17 'Burnup in MWd/kg' *.out | tail -17 | awk 'NF>0 {lines[++n]=$0} END {print "["; for(i=1;i<=n;i++) {printf "["; split(lines[i],a); for(j=1;j<=length(a);j++) printf "%s%s", a[j], (j<length(a)?",":""); printf "]%s\n", (i<n?",":"")} print "]"}'
output.decay_constants: grep 'Decay Constants:' *.out | awk '{printf "["; for(i=3; i<=8; i++) printf "%s%s", $i, (i<8?",":""); print "]"}'
